titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the 7-year restriction on eligibility for widow's and widower's insurance benefits based on disability.
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the 7-year restriction on eligibility for widow's and widower's insurance benefits based on disability.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill repeals the seven-year restriction on eligibility for widow's and widower's insurance benefit payments based on disability.
